track.name: Burnin' And Lootin'
comments: If there is a god, Bob Marley is probably sharing a spliff with him right now
after the riots, this was the first tune that came into my head
I prefer the original, but it's interesting...
This is my favourite off Chant Down Babylon.  Black Thought is amazing.

This is Bob Marley, it's just remixed on a reimagination album called "Chant Down Babylon". It was produced by his son, Stephen Marley and is pretty damn good. This song features an ill emcee, Black Thought of the legendary "Roots" crew.
this is black thought from the roots right + BoB¿¿¿
More Last.fm bullshit. This isn't Bob!
that sounds make so mystic mood.. ya!
Give me the original version PLEASE!
but orginal version burnin and Lootin very good :)
I looove this song, I love Robert Nesta Marley :)
the music is like the waves of the sea breaking over me......... so atmospheric Aaaaah!!!
